mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(rseq, tseq, rcontent, id, rpoint) VALUES(rseq.NEXTVAL, #{tseq}, #{rcontent}, #{id}, 2)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review WHERE tseq=#{tseq} order by regdate
select a.rseq, a.id, a.tseq, a.regdate, a.rpoint, a.rcontent, b.tname from review a, total_ent b where a.tseq=b.tseq and id=#{id} order by regdate desc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review WHERE id=#{id} and rseq=#{rseq}
